member.summary: Gets or sets the server address.

member.summary: Gets or sets the connection timeout in milliseconds.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use SSL.

member.name: P:AdvGenNoSqlServer.Client.AdvGenNoSqlClientOptions.SslTargetHost
member.summary: Gets or sets the target host name for SSL certificate validation. If not set, the server address will be used.

member.name: P:AdvGenNoSqlServer.Client.AdvGenNoSqlClientOptions.ClientCertificate
member.summary: Gets or sets the client certificate for mutual TLS (mTLS) authentication.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to check certificate revocation list.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether keep-alive is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the keep-alive interval in milliseconds.

member.name: P:AdvGenNoSqlServer.Client.AdvGenNoSqlClientOptions.MaxRetryAttempts
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum retry attempts for failed operations.

member.name: P:AdvGenNoSqlServer.Client.AdvGenNoSqlClientOptions.RetryDelayMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the retry delay in milliseconds.

member.name: P:AdvGenNoSqlServer.Client.AdvGenNoSqlClientOptions.AutoReconnect
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to auto-reconnect on connection loss.
